page.title: 11Tourism - Accomodation (B&B)
page.content: Bed and breakfast accomodation is a readily available. Many people supplement their normal income by opening their houses to the B&B trade. During the main holiday season (Whitsun to early September), many houses all over the area will be seen displaying a B&B sign. Prices will vary greatly according to the facilities available, such as shower with the room, colour tv., etc. A typical basic price would be Â£8 per night, but it can go up to Â£12. Most people who stay in B&B come in their own cars and intend to go sight seeing or walking in the area. The average stay is only one night. There has been a corresponding growth in the number of restaurants offering lunches and evening meals for those in B&B accomodation.
